description: Two men are accused of mutilating the bodies of Armenian soldiers in the Nagorno-Karabakh region.
title: Nagorno-Karabakh conflict: Azeri soldiers charged with war crimes
title_page: Nagorno-Karabakh conflict: Azeri soldiers charged with war crimes - BBC News
maintext: The region is recognised as part of Azerbaijan but has been run by ethnic Armenians since 1994 after the two countries fought a war over the territory which left thousands dead.
